name: Teamster
description:
Imagine always having new people to play your sport with nearby, who are at the same skill level as you. What about being able to see when your friends are playing sport this week so you could join them. Well now you can, with Teamster.
 
Teamster connects you with people who play your sport nearby & makes it easy to see and join your friends' weekly sport activities. If you are playing sport this week, post the Activity in Teamster so your friends can join in, and don't worry you can select who is able to join your activities.
 
READ MORE...
